channel.title: Need help making shops
channel.description: Hey I am using the client Project16 V6 for my server, and I wanna add shops and change the ones already on there. I dont know how after all im a new server owner myself, so help developing this would be great :D

item.title: Need help making shops
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Go into shops.cfg, and you can change the itemâ€™s and the amount of them in the shop, by changing the ID of the item, and amount of that item in the shop.

Read full topic
